ygData.subject: Re: Cleric Sit-in- reconsidering
ygData.msgSnippet: I have heard this very same thing about Fear, as well as, Hate.  I play on Fennin Ro and it will become bogged down and very lagged if there are that many
ygData.messageBody:
I have heard this very same thing about Fear, as well as, Hate. I play on
Fennin Ro and it will become bogged down and very lagged if there are that
many people and it WILL cause deaths. I for one was going to hate this
friday evening, however we are all reconsidering our fun adventure due to
this sit-in.
Its bad enough already that Fennin is the most heavily populated servers as
it is. I was in West Freeport as I previously stated when the Monk protest
took place and Yes I almost died, I was soloing Guard Jendl, when I realized
I could not longer click icons or use hotkeys to cast any spells at all, I
could not even sit down for pete's sake, thank god I could walk and
turn...So I was able to zone out.
I have already stated to you all how I feel about the sit-in so I won't go
there again, but please think of all the other innocent people who just want
to have fun and play, who you have a potential to adversely effect with this
action.

Bree Wyndsdale
50th Cleric of Fennin Ro
